Package application

Class NotificationApp

java.lang.Object
application.NotificationApp
public class NotificationApp
extends java.lang.Object
Creates an notification window when the user needs to be alerted that their pet requires attention.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javafx.scene.image.ImageView corgiIcon
    The view of the image of a corgi for display in the notification window.
    private javafx.scene.image.Image corgiImage
    The underlying image of a corgi for the notification window.
    protected javafx.stage.Stage gwStage
    The main stage used by the GameWindow class.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button ignoreButton
    The clickable button that users choose to ignore their pet.
    protected long milliseconds
    The time in-between notifications in milliseconds.
    protected double minutes
    The time in-between notifications in minutes.
    private javafx.scene.image.Image notificationBackground
    The background image for the notification.
    private javafx.scene.layout.BackgroundImage notificationBI
    The background image applied to the notification via the BackgroundImage class.
    protected long seconds
    The time in-between notifications in seconds.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button windowButton
    The clickable button that redirects the user to the main GameWindow.
